_description: ‘The XXX Virtues of the Mass’ — 136 lines in couplets

BodRawPoe32.First Lines:
xxx vertewis schal haue hethat wolle the masse hire or
                    se…
BodRawPoe32.Last Lines:
…And louyth the masse with alle youre myndeAnd god wolle sende
                    you a gode ende

YaleBei317.First Lines:
The needes & graces of þe masse beholdeAlle [ ] puple
                    bothe yonge & oldeAs yn this booke foloweth wryten yn dedeThat yn
                    youre workes þe bettir ye may spede…
YaleBei317.Last Lines:
…And þat þrough grace it may so beAlmyghty god
                    graunte yn trynyte
YaleBei317.Note:
Thirty-four 4-line stanzas (aabb) plus 16-line prologue and 14-line
                    epilogue.
